Philippe MOULIN wrote:

> But there is still one strange problem: I have to put IP addresses in my
> seeds.txt file. Whenever a DNS lookup is needed,
> *org.archive.util.DNSJavaUtil.*getHostAddress(....) blocks during 30
> seconds, and returns a null.
>
> I have made a small main() which tests getHostAddress alone, and i 
> have obtained the same results:
> it always blocks for 30 seconds (this looks like a default timeout 
> value) and then returns a Null.
> No log messages are printed.
>
On the same machine, the standalone Heritrix works without need of 
specifying seeds as IPs?  Otherwise, I'd say there's an issue with DNS 
on your windows machine.
St.Ack
